text: The Chevrolet Detroit Grand Prix presented by Lear Corporation was the lone doubleheader event of the 2019 IndyCar Series season, consisting of the 7th and 8th rounds of the championship. The event was held at the Raceway at Belle Isle in Detroit, Michigan. Josef Newgarden won a shortened Race 1, and Scott Dixon won the Sunday race. == Race 1 – Saturday, June 1 == === Results === {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 95%;" !Icon !Meaning |- | align="center" |R |Rookie |- | align="center" |W |Past winner |} ==== Qualifying ==== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center; font-size: 95%;" !Pos !No. !Name !Group !Time |- !
